response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its importance to you, I understand its worth to be $800,000. My proposal is to offer it to you for $950,000. This price reflects the value we place on the product while allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require more information about the product, feel free to ask. I am here to provide all the necessary details to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
